About.Hours & facilities: Open from Wednesday to Sunday 10am—4pm or other times by appointment. Open public holidays except Good Friday and Christmas Day. General reference assistance available from several of the volunteers. All assistance possible from a strictly amateur staff regarding photos, books and other documentation

About.Access: Access to records granted and may be supervised.

About.Major holdings: Some histories of prominent local families and business people, their activities and pursuits. Histories of a prosperous rural region and a rural industrial town.

Contact.Note: The Junee and District Historical Society formerly operated the Museum in Peel Street, Junee.
